# Organising The Data

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

df<-read.csv(file = "data/aggregated_mpox_case_data.csv") |> 
  as.data.frame() |> 
  group_by(who_region,month_start) |> 
  summarise(cases=sum(cases)) |> 
  as.data.frame() |> 
  mutate(year_month=strftime(month_start,format = "%Y-%m"))
```

# Plotting The Data

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ggplot(data = df)+
  geom_bar(aes(x=year_month,y=cases,fill = who_region),stat = "identity",col="black")+
  theme_bw()+
  facet_grid(who_region~.,scales = "free_y")+ scale_fill_discrete(name = "WHO Region")+xlab("Date")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))
```
